alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 18 at 5:08AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ROCK...NORTHWESTERN LOUP...SOUTHEASTERN BROWN AND NORTHEASTERN BLAINE COUNTIES... At 508 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Brewster, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rose and Fox Bayou. This includes Highway 183 between mile markers 139 and 154. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
